short_summary: RMSO Dairy Products, Cheeses and Eggs
description: The Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional Service of Canada and Department of National Defense is issuing this request for standing offer for the acquisition of dairy products, cheese and eggs located in Quebec, as detailed in Annex A.
tags: Standing Offer - Goods - Dairy and related products

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Title

* English: E6MON-23PQLA - RMSO Dairy Products, Cheeses and Eggs
* French: E6MON-23PQLA - OCPR Produits laitiers, Fromages et Oeufs

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3954416774-Doc3954470866
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 11th, 2023 2:00:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Defined
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31st, 2024

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3954416774
* **Publication Date**: April 11th, 2023
* **Amendment Date**: April 6th, 2023

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Regions of Opportunity

* None

## Regions of Delivery

* Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Andy Doucette
* **Email**: andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone Number**: Not Provided
* **Department**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Attachment and Description

See the attached document for detailed specifications and instructions.

Submission Guidelines:

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 2:00:00 PM EDT on May 11th, 2023.
* Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
